titleStmt.title: Orders and constitutions, partly collected out of his Maiesties letters patents; and partly by authority, and in vertue of the said letters patents: ordained vpon mature deliberation, by the gouernour and company of the city of London, for the plantation of the Summer-Islands: for the better gouerning of the actions and affaires of the said company and plantation. 6. Febr. 1621
Laws, etc. 1621-02-06
titleStmt.author: Bermuda Islands.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
